sentences.sContent: He gave them a splendid lunch of smoked salmon.
sentences.sCn: 他款待了他们一顿极好的熏三文鱼午餐。

synos.tran: 鲑鱼；[鱼]大马哈鱼；鲑肉色

phrases.pCn: [生]太平洋鲑鱼；大鳞大麻哈鱼；大麻哈鱼属（等于Oncorhynchus）

trans.tranOther: Salmon is the orangey-pink flesh of this fish which is eaten as food. It is often smoked and eaten raw.
